name: Legends of Attila
description:
Game made for "Historically Accurate Game Jam 4". You take control of a detachment of Huns led by Attila and go on a military campaign.

Monitor the fatigue and mood of your squad. And also do not forget to replenish the provisions. 

Upgrade your squad, win battles and make difficult decisions.

Answer Honoria's call and lead the army to the imperial residence at Mediolanum.

Known issue: When restarting the game with the restart button, the game is interrupted, so completely reload the page, sorry for the inconvenience.
